name: Alien PARKOUR
description:
Alien PARKOUR is a quick puzzle game.
It has been made by only one person (myself) during a class project.
My goal here was to create a little game that can be solved easily, and be repeated again and again to find tricks and tips to improve your score and try to be the fastest !

I am waiting for comments and things that can be improved (and maybe ideas for others levels ?).
I didn't want to add a jump button because there are already ways to perform a jump, sometimes !

Don't forget to comment your best score below !

And more than all… Have fun !
